	skill_description: The intent to add a receipt or other documentation to support an expense claim.

* d2df4b96547a4008aff16
	name: Submit Expense
	skill_description: The intent to submit expenses incurred by an employee for work-related activities.

			description: The type or category of the expense being submitted.

		* 42181cca223d4e9c98740

			entity_similar_values: ['$100', '$250', '$500', '$1000']

			name: date_of_expense
			description: The date when the expense was incurred.

		* 76ea951cf4964708ba92b
			name: receipt_attachment
			description: A digital copy or image of the receipt for the expense.



* c46338aa4f364aeca5c77
	name: Dispute Charge
	skill_description: The intent to dispute a charge that has been incorrectly added to an expense report.

			description: The unique identification number assigned to an expense report.

			name: charge_amount
			description: The amount that was incorrectly charged.

			description: The name of the merchant where the disputed charge was made.

		* f4a241e26a1a46b0bf080
			name: dispute_reason
